original_text: I will mention the lovingkindnesses of the Lord, and the praises of the Lord, according to all that the Lord hath bestowed on us, and the great goodness toward the house of Israel, which he hath bestowed on them according to his mercies, and according to the multitude of his lovingkindnesses.
korean_text: 내가 여호와께서 우리에게 베푸신 모든 자비와 그의 찬송을 말하며 그의 사랑을 따라, 그의 많은 자비를 따라 이스라엘 집에 베푸신 큰 은총을 말하리라

sentences.original_text: I will mention the lovingkindnesses of the Lord
and the praises of the Lord
according to all that the Lord has bestowed on us
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 우리에게 베풀어주신 모든 것에 따라

sentences.original_text: and the great goodness toward the house of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 집을 향하신 큰 선하심을 말하겠습니다

sentences.original_text: which He has bestowed on them according to His mercies
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서 그분의 긍휼에 따라 그들에게 베푸신 것

sentences.original_text: and according to the multitude of His lovingkindnesses
